citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The hooves of an approximately 12-year-old female red river hog "Trisha" are excessively overgrown and have not been
trimmed since 2022. All 4 feet are deformed. The animal appears reluctant to move and has a lameness when walking.
The medical record notes a history of osteoarthritis. A facility representative stated there is not an appropriate scale
available to accurately weigh the animal. During inspection the animal appeared overconditioned with a smooth fleshy
appearance. Overgrown hooves can cause lameness, pain and can lead to other serious conditions. The licensee must
work with the Attending Veterinarian to develop a plan for timely treatment and must maintain a program of adequate
veterinary care.
Correct by end of business 17 April 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
Additional Inspectors:
Tamila Stott, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)  Direct
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The hooves of an approximately 12-year-old female red river hog "Trisha" are excessively overgrown and have not been 
trimmed since 2022. All 4 feet are deformed. The animal appears reluctant to move and has a lameness when walking. 
The medical record notes a history of osteoarthritis. A facility representative stated there is not an appropriate scale 
available to accurately weigh the animal. During inspection the animal appeared overconditioned with a smooth fleshy 
appearance. Overgrown hooves can cause lameness, pain and can lead to other serious conditions. The licensee must 
work with the Attending Veterinarian to develop a plan for timely treatment and must maintain a program of adequate 
veterinary care. 
 
Correct by end of business 17 April 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Tamila Stott, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
